/** @format */ import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { Box, Typography, Grid, TextField, Table, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, TableCell, Checkbox, FormControlLabel, Switch, } from "@mui/material"; import { LocalizationProvider, DateRangePicker, MobileDateRangePicker, DesktopDateRangePicker, } from "@mui/lab"; import AdapterDateFns from "@mui/lab/AdapterDateFns"; import Stack from "@mui/material/Stack"; import { useToggle } from "../../context/useToggle"; import { styled } from "@mui/styles"; import { setDate } from "date-fns"; const CreateInvoice = () => { const [approvel, setApprovel] = useToggle(false); const [invoiceData, setInvoiceData] = useState({ matter: "", contact: "", billable: false, date_range: "", create_date: "", due_date: "", template: "", invoice_no: "", discount: "", submit: false, }); const { matter, contact, billable, date_range, create_date, due_date, template, invoice_no, discount, submit, } = invoiceData; const [invoice, setInvoice] = useState(null); // useEffect(() => { // const config = { // headers: { // "Content-Type": "application/json", // Accept: "application/json", // }, // }; // const res = axios.get( // `${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}/api/category`, // config, // ); // setInvoice(res.data); // }, []); const onChange = (e) => setInvoiceData({ ...invoiceData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; const [dateRange, setDateRange] = React.useState([null, null]); return ( onSubmit(e)} > Create New Invoice onChange(e)} id="matter" autoComplete="matter" /> onChange(e)} id="contact" autoComplete="contact" /> onChange(e)} id="billable" /> } label="Unbillable" /> Date Range { setDateRange(newValue); }} renderInput={(startProps, endProps) => ( to )} /> onChange(e)} id="due_date" autoComplete="due_date" /> onChange(e)} id="template" autoComplete="template" /> onChange(e)} id="contact" autoComplete="contact" /> onChange(e)} id="invoice_no" autoComplete="invoice_no" /> onChange(e)} id="discount" autoComplete="discount" /> setApprovel(approvel)} /> } /> Sub-Category Description Date Hours Rate Sub Tax int Disc. Total Biller {invoice?.map((invoice) => { {invoice.sub_cat} {invoice.discription} {invoice.date} {invoice.hours} {invoice.rate} {invoice.sub} {invoice.tax} {invoice.int} {invoice.dics} {invoice.total} {invoice.biller} ; })}
onChange(e)} id="billable" /> } label="Notes" /> onChange(e)} id="Accept Online Payment" /> } label="Unbillable" /> onChange(e)} id="billable" /> } label="Terms & Conditions" /> onChange(e)} id="billable" /> } label="Add interest (Compound / Simple)" /> onChange(e)} id="billable" /> } label="Use Trust Balanace" /> onChange(e)} id="billable" /> } label="Send Reminders Every" /> onChange(e)} id="billable" /> } label="Add all unpaid invoices" /> onChange(e)} id="billable" /> } label="use Operating Balance" /> ); }; export default CreateInvoice;
